{{html:
    <div class="row txt-center margin-vertical-small" ng-show="assignIPMessage">
       <div class="alert alert-warning" style="margin: 0 auto !important; width: 400px;">{[ assignIPMessage ]}</div>
    </div>
    <h1 ng-class="{opacity4: assignIPMessage != ''}">Defense Shield</h1>
    <p ng-class="{opacity4: assignIPMessage != ''}">The Defense Shield is your personal firewall that handles all incoming and outgoing traffic for your Cloud Space, your routing and firewall settings.</p>
<style>
.modal
{
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: -25% 0 0 -50%;
}
</style>
 	<div ng-controller="NetworkController">
 		<div>
 			<button class="btn" ng-click="showDefenseShield()" ng-disabled="assignIPMessage">Advanced Shield configuration</button>
 		</div>
		<script type="text/ng-template" id="routerosDialog.html">
                <div class="modal-header">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary ok" ng-click="cancel()">Close</button>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-body" style="width:100%;height:100%;" ng-bind-html="defenseshieldframe">
                </div>
        </script>

 	</div>
     <script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/machineServices.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
     <script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/Network/NetworkController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
	<script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/NetworkServices.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
 }}
